website_summaries.verdict: The Parrot CK3100 combines a simple, easy to use control interface with a good voice-recognition system to provide drivers with easy hands-free calling on the road.
pros: The Parrot CK3100 is a cost-effective Bluetooth hands-free calling system with some surprisingly advanced calling features including a decent voice-command interface and a useful phonebook-syncing feature
cons: Programming in voice tags for contacts can be time consuming, and there is no option for dialing individual numbers by voice

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth at its best!
customer_reviews.text: I found the Parrot hands free bluetooth equipment was easy to use, had a good quality sound depending upon the radio it is hooked to and a easy way to dial using the voice command in your cell phone's address book. You can easily manipulate and see your phone book in the LCD screen using the center knob of the Parrot; whenyou see the name you push the center knob and your call is accomplished. The only negative was the installation. It must be done by a professional. I now have a parrot installed in each automobile. I love the convenience of having a hands-free instrument and not having to go against the law in my state.
customer_reviews.author: Howie_N

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: This is even better than I thought it would be. The cities around me are going hands free and I didn't want to pay $500 for a dealer to put a hands free unit in my Tacoma. Took a while to sync my Asus phone but it finally did and I'm happy I decided on the Parrot CK3100. Only took a couple of seconds to load my contacts. Callers tell me call quality is good so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these devices (1 professionally installed and 2 installed personally). All units work very well. The voice dial feature is excellent. I have also had a Motorola bluetooth car kit and the Parrot works much better than the Moto kit. I have these units working with a Blackberry and a Treo with no issues. I would recommend these to anyone. My only issue was the self-install is very complex. I would only recommend self install to those accustomed to car electronics installations.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack meets tiger

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my wife and grand kids alive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's car because the one that was already in there wouldn't sync with a Galaxy S3, though it was the same model. It installed easily and helps my wife to keep the car out of a ditch while talking on the phone. Now, if only I could teach her to use cruise control.
customer_reviews.author: Jimreaper

customer_reviews.title: Proud parrot owner
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about the hands free bluetooth technology. I was proven wrong. It sounds great the mic works with clarity. I'm a fan of the volume adjust on the unit, If my windows are down I can turn it up to hear clearly. It downloaded my phone book into it when I did the initial install, so the screen displays who's calling. the only downfall is accusations of animal cruelty when I say I have a parrot in my car ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My second Parrot CK3100 LCD Bluetooth Car Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is another Parrot CK3100 that I bought, and had it installed at a Bestbuy place. I like the performance of this device. Loud and clear for both incoming and outgoing calls.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Siangio

customer_reviews.title: Hands free car kit
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased 5 Parrot Bluetooth Car Kits for Christmas gifts. I have one in my car for about a year now and love it. The Parrot is easy to use and very safe while driving. With my old cell phone the audio was much better, now I have the Iphone and people tell me that it is difficult at times to understand me while talking. There may be something on my phone to correct the audio problem but I don't know at this time, I have not checked into it. All in all I would still purchase another kit, it makes my life so much easier making and answering business calls while driving. Roxy from CA
customer_reviews.author: Carol Semon

customer_reviews.title: No problems here
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an earlier version that failed. so far it has worked nicely and the wife is happy! About a month and a half now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Good hands free blue tooth system for your car
customer_reviews.text: Works great as advertised. This is my second parrot system. Only complaint is echo of incoming voice to incoming caller. Not overwhelming though, just an annoyance. You do need separate harness system to make install easier by quickconnect.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Parrot needed additional $150 wiring harness
customer_reviews.text: Professional installer called parrot support because of questions. Parrot support told him I needed a wiring harness that would cost an additional $150. I have a 2013 Dodge Ram 2500. Installer said the Parrots are designed mostly for foreign cars.
customer_reviews.author: J Vald

customer_reviews.title: This Parrot is just great. I still use it in my Honda SUV ...
customer_reviews.text: This Parrot is just great. I still use it in my Honda SUV 2009 and is in perfect working order after 6 and a half years
customer_reviews.author: Tweety1947

customer_reviews.title: perfect product
customer_reviews.text: The kit was delivered in less than a week within the US. The installation was easy, I recommend buying the specific car harness for plug and play installation. It worked from the first try, sound is clear on both ends of the conversation and the radio is muted as the call is made. Really happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Magdalinis

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but poor support
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these devices one worked fine and the other is faulty . Unfortunately parrot's technical support is very very slow to respond.. I wait patiently. If both worked I would have given 4-5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Parris

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for hubby. He calls me on his way home from work. It's clear and easy to hear him and he loves using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Parrot CK3100. It arrived as promised. I recommend this seller. L. Arroyo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fix only what is broken!
customer_reviews.text: Replacement saved us putting in new system! We love the Parrot , installed in our Hummer it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Buehler

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product...I had one in my car when I bought it and I bought another for my mother for Christmas. She loves the convenience and the quality of sound, talking and listening, is excellent. Would recommend it to anyone looking for a device like this.
customer_reviews.author: JessEKU

customer_reviews.title: LESS CHANCE OF HAVING A WRECK IN MY CAR...
customer_reviews.text: Now that my hands free PARROT is installed in my car, there's less chance of accident as both hands are on the wheel!! Smart choice - pushed on me by my family...
customer_reviews.author: A. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is my third parrot device. I have been pleased with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hands free device
customer_reviews.text: The Parrot CK3100 is a great Bluetooth hands free add on. We Use it a lot for construction companies. Does not stream music.
customer_reviews.author: AudioExpert

customer_reviews.title: still trying
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my company truck. The first one did not work at all. The second one worked great for about two weeks then the display quit. I like the concept and it is user friendly (then it works). I'll try one more before I give up on this model.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to hook up with additional cable from quickconnect.com Went into a crown vic police car. Sound quality is very good on my end but some callers say that they can tell I'm on a bluetooth of some sorts. The voice commands work very well. This is truly a great hands-free system.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: parrot sucks
customer_reviews.text: Did not recieve full kit and no coopreation with company. I have did anazons suggestions on return policy and contacted company with one response. Do not know what to do from this point on.
customer_reviews.author: debrajanemay

customer_reviews.title: Just needed some parts to repair already installed unit.
customer_reviews.text: Had parts in the previous parrot not failed I would not be ordering this one. It was used for parts.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product if you ever need any support ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product if you ever need any support from Parrot.com. The'll never answer any e-mail questions you send them even but they guarantee a response within 48 hrs. I am sending the product back, not worth having with this type of support.
customer_reviews.author: Masse

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult for my parents to understand and connect
customer_reviews.text: It was too difficult for my older parents to deal with. They didn't want the hassle of connecting it to vehicle
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lattimer

customer_reviews.title: Parrot makes great products but the fulfillment company totally let me down
customer_reviews.text: Item never showed up. Tracking information was incorrect or missing. Parrot makes great products but the fulfillment company totally let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Mvpolo2k3

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth for car
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth for car, I tried many many product, all of them has some issue, this is by far the best one, you have to be comfortable for bascally remove your Radio to have access to the back, also need to be harness separately and then just find a way to run cable install to box and also the controller, once you install it, it works like a factory Bluetooth. Very happy with it after almost 6 month of use.
customer_reviews.author: A E

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if it works with your phone and vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: This unit requires an additional wiring harness/adapter for most American made vehicles and it's specific to year make and model. It also works well with some phones but not others be sure to check the compatibility list at the Parrot site before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Kennedy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: the fine for your 1st offense for talking on the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: In California, the fine for your 1st offense for talking on the phone is $350; the fine is doubled for the 2nd offense. I use this all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Pepperdogger

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like hands free
customer_reviews.text: I am renewing an old installation, exact replacement. This is old technology, but it works
customer_reviews.author: Philip W Schick

customer_reviews.title: Works ok so far. Non existent installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: Took me 8 hrs to install. Absolutely no instructions whatsoever. I understand that instructions can vary by car - but this is plain simple ridiculous. Had to do a lot of searching online to get the job done.. After installation - seems to work good so far. Full radio volume is not muted on call arrival. Rear sub-woofer still plays the song - but is low enough not to interrupt conversation.....
customer_reviews.author: Indian Pirate

customer_reviews.title: works fine for basic function
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these an both have a problem sometimes: after hanging up some calls, the unmute Doesn't work. There is a limit to register devices and you have to delete sometimes old one to be able to put some more. The audio is good quality in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Z

customer_reviews.title: Love this bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the one had that stopped working/
customer_reviews.author: Irene Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!!
customer_reviews.text: I had brought this product keeping in mind the amount of talking I do over the phone while driving. This product was installed by my dealer and the initial setup was smooth for me. The sync happened without a glitch, the voice dialing feature was done easily and it does recognise my voice very easily. Whenever a call comes, the auto answers picks up the call and I am able to hear the audio clearly. Nice product and useful for people who talk on phone while driving!
customer_reviews.author: shre78

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with aftermarket connector
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for installation in my 2008 Ford Taurus X after seeing others do the same on other online forums. The installation was a snap thanks to the quickconnect harness that was sold separately. I did not have to cut or splice any wires, and it was a breeze. It might have taken me a little over 1/2 hour. I installed the display on my dashboard just above my radio, and the microphone up above my rearview mirror. The sound is clear, and I have had no problems using it with my Verizon G'Zone bluetooth phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rob K

customer_reviews.title: Installed in a 2004 Honda Accord and it works beautifully. Buy the aftermarket wire harness
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 2004 Honda Accord and it works beautifully. Buy the aftermarket wire harness! That made it plug&play. Oh yes. I bought the factory reconditioned one. Saved some money and it looks and works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, need wiring harness to make easy instalation, you better get it, for best instalation .
customer_reviews.author: fabrice

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second device I've bought and both of them are working strong. The connection to the handset is excellent, voice clarity is perfect, and it even works when calling through the Viber app on my iPhone. I highly recommend it for cars that don't have a built-in Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.author: Juan Martin Lora

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: I have a new car with built in blue tooth, then I got this for my other car. works just as well. M very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ullman

customer_reviews.title: GOOD AFTERMARKET!
customer_reviews.text: KINDA SLOW DOING THIS REVIEW - HAD FOR 4 YRS, TAKING OUT OF A FORD F150 AND PUTTING IN AN FJ CRUISER. AWSOME PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: john lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works great installed in Honda Odyssey 2005 EX-L with Navigation, Satellite radio, and RES (DVD player). I used a professional installation service. The Parrot connects 5 phones but ONLY ONE AT A TIME. Otherwise, works great. As others have noted, the Bluetooth works with or without the radio being on. Incoming calls interrupts all sound to speakers so as to take the call. Navigation screen still functions as it should as well as DVD. Great product. Also, purchase recommended harness from Amazon, helps with installation.
customer_reviews.author: F. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Parrot works great, but I bought this long ago and now have phones like Samsung S6 edge and they don't work. Almost all new cars come with bluetooth now. This was for our older car and works great, but is now broken.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Luong

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It is not so easy to install and it is not possible to use whithout wiring it
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz D. De Bango

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it provides clear sound with no ferdback
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hawkins

product_meta.title: Parrot CK3100 LCD Bluetooth Car Kit
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingParrot CK3100 LCD Bluetooth Car Kit

AMAZON.COM
With the Parrot CK3100, you will be able to place and receive calls in comfort and safety, without ever touching your mobile phone. At a time when legislation is tightening up to restrict the use of mobile phones in vehicles due to safety concerns, the Parrot CK3100's benefits are not just for the sake of convenience and comfort -- they are fast becoming a real necessity. The Parrot CK3100 wirelessly connects with all Bluetooth phones on the market and is compatible with all brands. The display of the CK3100 provides the same visual information and functions as your mobile phone, such as caller ID, carrier signal strength, or last calls received, in large well-contrasted digits easy to read at a glance on a screen that can be clipped in the ideal position for the driver to see.

 Turn on the car engine and the phone connects wirelessly to the Parrot CK3100 Car Kit. The screen unit has easy-to-navigate menu options just like your phone, and your mobile phone book is wirelessly downloaded to the car kit. Calls can be dialed either through the screen, or by using voice-recognition speed dialing. According to your phone's model and firmware, most features are accessible from the hands free console, including one-touch redial, dual call, and auto-answer.

 The Parrot CK3100 Bluetooth car kit can be installed in almost any vehicle, and is designed to automatically mute the radio during use. Incorporating high-quality sound, the CK3100 includes both echo cancellation and noise reduction technology. As with all Parrot car-kit devices, the CK3100 Bluetooth car-kit offers the user seamless, hands-free use without the inconvenience of wires, headsets, or cradles. This unit also features user connection priority management for up to five users, up to 200 voice tags for its voice recognition, multi-user use for up to three phones, private conversation mode, and much more.

 Please note this car-kit will not work in cars that use optical cabling. Check with your car dealer before ordering. Also, since this car-kit is installed by hard-wiring to the existing car stereo, professional installation is highly recommended.

 What's in the Box
The CK3100 electronic control unit, LCD display with buttons and cable, microphone with cable, radio mute cable with line output (ISO cable), power supply cable, and a user guide in 7 languages.
feature_bullets: Parrot CK3100 LCD Bluetooth Car Kit
Parrot CK3100 LCD Bluetooth Car Kit
Parrot CK3100 LCD Bluetooth Car Kit
LCD screen displays standard mobile phone information: incoming calls, recent calls, missed calls, voice mail, directory, ect
Hands-free, unidirectionnal microphone provides voice recognition dialling of up to 150 names, while reducing background noise and ambient echo
Browser button allows users to scroll through menus and control the volume

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,085 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
